title: Pakistani actress Saba Qamar pokes fun at Bollywood actors in THIS throwback video! - Watch​ | Zee News
text:
Pakistani actress Saba Qamar pokes fun at Bollywood actors in THIS throwback video! - Watch​ By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Thursday, February 16, 2017 - 15:30 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: After Mahira Khan's old video in which she talks ill about Bollywood surfaced online, another video featuring Pakistani actress Saba Qamar has emerged. In the video, Saba can be seen taking a jibe at some of the big names in Bollywood. 
In the short clip, the 32-year-old actress can be seen insulting the hunks of Indian cinema. From Hrithik Roshan to Salman Khan, Saba is ripping apart Bollywood biggies with unimpressive words. 
The video appears out to be from a Pakistani television show. MUST READ Sudden ban on Pakistani artists unfair: Rishi Kapoor 
Watch for yourself: 
Ironically, Saba will be making her Bollywood debut with Irrfan Khan starrer 'Hindi Medium'. It is slated to release on May 12 this year. First Published: Thursday, February 16, 2017 - 14:24 More from zeenews
